posts.post_content:
I'm brokering this card from the recent North Carolina find. To note, the gentleman that owns the collection will be the payee, by money order or cashiers check only, and he will also handle the shipping, although I completely stand behind any transaction(s).

Scan and pricing here:
[url]http://www.collectorfocus.com/collection/ncfind/t206-white-borders[/url]

Emails have priority: [url]trae@t206.org[/url]
Offers welcome.

Here's a photograph before the card was sent in to PSA...

[img]http://co.llect.com/i/91111/2cPUA.jpg[/img]
Deal went bad... Shag is back for sale.
